title: Ticket #644: param_*() should have a no default signature
description:
For the config file entries denoted in param_info.in and that are handled by the default table base, the default arguments for calls like param_integer("FOO", 42) don't need to exist in the source code anymore and need to be changed to calls like param_integer("FOO") (all integer typed variables are defined to have a real default, for example).

However, for entries which are not in the default param table yet, the defaults need to stay. Some code could be written in the middle param_* layer to EXCEPT in this case to help a person performing the API change.
